definition: the Papacy/the Vatican/the Church government/Holy See
an ambassador of the church/an Apostolic Nuncio (from the Vatican)
the Church (as Royal Court)/the Holy See/the Vatican

sentences.english: The papal captain have vainly endeavoured to induce his wife to remain behind him .
sentences.chinese: 教廷的队长曾白费力气地试图说服妻子留下不去。

sentences.english: With convincing power he portrayed the usurpation and corruptions of the papal see.
sentences.chinese: 他有力地抨击罗马教廷僭越权限和腐化败坏的行为。

sentences.english: The Vatican was compelled, to establish an independent country, within the boundary of Italy.
sentences.chinese: 教廷被迫在梵蒂冈成为意大利境内的一个独立国家。

sentences.english: But opposition to assisted conception is official papal policy.
sentences.chinese: 但是，反对人工辅助受孕则是教廷的正式立场。

sentences.english: But in addition to these extraordinary levies there were many permanent sources of revenue for the support of the Papal Court.
sentences.chinese: 除了这些特别税外，教廷还有许多固定收入的保障。

sentences.english: That's like sending an Episcopalian to oversee the Vatican for 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 这就像派一个主教成员去监督罗马教廷。

sentences.english: Paul also reorganized the curia and spoke strongly for peace and social justice.
sentences.chinese: 保罗也改组教廷，并以强烈的和平和社会正义。

sentences.english: Papal diplomacy is almost as old as the papacy.
sentences.chinese: 教廷外交几乎同教皇的职位一样古老。

sentences.english: Raphael is best known for his Madonnas and for his large figure compositions in the Vatican in Rome.
sentences.chinese: 拉斐尔以画圣母像和罗马教廷里的大幅作品而闻名。
